section.name: Release notes for version 4.2
section.p: Apache Commons Collections is a project to develop and maintain collection classes based on and inspired by the JDK collection framework.
This 4.2 release is a minor and updates the platform requirement from Java 6 to 7. This release fixes several bugs present in previous releases of the 4.X branch.
All users are strongly encouraged to updated to this release.

ul.li: Java 7 or later is now required (version 4.1 required Java 6)
Updates the platform requirement from Java 6 to 7
Add Automatic-Module-Name MANIFEST entry for Java 9 compatibility

section.p: For a full list of changes in this release, refer to the Change report.
